name: ButtonGroup
description: A sp-button-group delivers a set of buttons in horizontal or vertical orientation while ensuring the appropriate spacing between those buttons.

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Use vertical orientation when horizontal space is limited

slots.name: default
slots.description: The sp-button elements that make up the group

examples.title: Horizontal Button Group
examples.description: A default button group with horizontal orientation

examples.title: Vertical Button Group
examples.description: A button group with vertical orientation
